description: Numbers written in base of double factorial numbers.
comments: a(1122755752855713895623244049306709034778906250) is the first term which cannot be included in the OEIS since it includes a non-decimal digit. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 19 2012
references: F. Iacobescu, Smarandache Partition Type and Other Sequences, Bull. Pure Appl. Sciences, Vol. 16E, No. 2 (1997), pp. 237-240.
